body:
Turns out I just need to set the publicPath option under output. I set up my ansible script to write the bucket address into a nearby file.

{bucket} = require "./bucket.json"


module.exports =
    context: __dirname
    entry: require "./entries.coffee"
    output:
        path: path.resolve 'app/static/dist/'
        filename: '[name].js'
        sourceMapFilename: "[name].map.js",
        publicPath: bucket + "/static/dist/"
title: Webpack: Loading Codesplit Chunks from S3 Using Django Storage
